entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
